name: Black Phoenix Alchemy Lab
profile:
Los Angeles-based perfume house, specializing in blends that interpret mythology, history, popular culture, folklore, poetry, and visual artwork through scent. Visit our store online: https://blackphoenixalchemylab.com

Our scents are unique to Black Phoenix, and are all created in-house by Elizabeth Barrial or Brian Constantine, and every single one is hand-blended. We have over sixteen years of experience in the field, including collaborations with Jim Henson, Neil Gaiman, Guillermo Del Toro, Kelly Sue DeConnick, and many more. 

Since 2016, we have been proud to declare our activism by creating perfumes that raise funds for a variety of causes related to civil liberties. Those can be found here: https://blackphoenixalchemylab.com/product-category/activism/
